name: The Red Box
description:
Red Box is a platforming game with custom music made by Coghner (a.k.a Necolas)

It's still in development, in it actual state it has: 4 levels.

My goal is to have 20 levels (24 with the tutorial levels), 5 levels in each world, and each world with custom music. and probably a final boss (because why not?).
